UpperArmsSMCloseGripBenchPress.name: Smith Close Grip Bench Press
UpperArmsSMCloseGripBenchPress.preparation: Lie on bench with bar above chest and grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
UpperArmsSMCloseGripBenchPress.execution: Lower weight to chest with elbows close to body. Push bar back up until arms are straight. Repeat.
UpperArmsSMCloseGripBenchPress.comments: Grip can be slightly narrower than shoulder width but not too close. Also see Bench Press Analysis.

UpperArmsSMCloseGripInclineBenchPress.name: Smith Close Grip Incline Bench Press
UpperArmsSMCloseGripInclineBenchPress.preparation: Lie on incline bench with bar above chest and grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
UpperArmsSMCloseGripInclineBenchPress.execution: Lower weight to chest with elbows close to body. Push bar back up until arms are straight. Repeat.
UpperArmsSMCloseGripInclineBenchPress.comments: Grip can be slightly narrower than shoulder width but not too close. Also see Bench Press Analysis.
